mol – Molecular structures and surfaces¶

The mol module implement data structure to work with molecular datasets. At its heart lie the EntityHandle and EntityView classes which represent molecular structures such as proteins, DNA, RNA and small molecules. There are also classes to deal with molecular surfaces.
